column5: All the same rules apply when posting there as they do here. Don't spam, don't swear, etc. The sames rules go for whatever other new gadget we may add to the site.
Not a big fan of the status.........just sayin.  S.
You can toggle it closed if'n you don't like it...just saying.
Where might one find this "toggle" control?  Just curious!  Michael
On the board's main page, there's an arrow at the right sidebar....you can toggle it either way.

So this "status" only appears on the main page and can be toggled? Can't see what the big deal might be.  Kinda neat that there's that spot for daily messages I think. Not intrusive, is about members only (or is intended to be).  I thought I hadn't turned it "on" because I only saw it on the main page. Works for me, but maybe it should be scrollable to see all messages (if it is I haven't found out how yet).  Michael
